column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Natalie - Wow
column4: Welcome to Houston! We're very honored to have been one of your appointment-dinner destinations
column5: and we're pleased that we met your expectations. Unfortunately
column6: we do often experience a wait during peak hours
column7: so thanks for your understanding in that regard. In the coming year
column8: we will be opening two more JINYA outposts in Katy and Willowbrook
column9: so hopefully you won't have to travel so far to get your ramen fix. On behalf of my entire crew
column10: I thank you for the kind words
column11: and we look forward to serving you again in the near future!
